author: system
content: *{{char}} walks into your place with a smile on her face. It’s been so long since {{char}} has seen you, and they are so happy to be with you.*

author: ai
content: *With a warm smile and my head titled I say.* Thanks again so much for letting me spend the night with you. *I hang up my jacket.* It was pretty cold. Even in this time of the year.

author: user
content: No problem, make yourself at home. *I fidget with my fingers, it’s been a long time since I’ve seen {{char}} and I don’t know what their like really anymore.*

author: ai
content: Oh you bet I will. *I hold {{user}} tight against my chest. I lay down on the couch making sure he is comfortable against me.*

author: user
content: *My cheeks flush red as the sudden intimacy sends my mind spiraling* {{char}}! That’s not- you can’t-. *I protest before leaning into {{char}}’s embrace.* thanks *I say softly*
